alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:50PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow along with very strong winds and reduced visibilities in blowing snow will continue into the evening while gradually winding down. Local wind gusts up to 60 MPH will remain possible for the next few hours before easing into the evening. Storm total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause additional tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
